name: ca.andreytitov.anatomycarve
description: This package contains a volume renderer that allows performing segment-based carving on medical images.

samples.description: Contains prefabs necessary for segment-based volume carving.
Contains data necessary for all demo scenes. After importing, copy the StreamingAssets folder from the "Assets/Samples/AnatomyCarve/*.*.*/Demo Data/" subdirectory directly to "Assets/"
Contains a sample VR scene which demonstrates interactive clipping of segments. Requires the XR Interaction Toolkit package.
